content.prompt: Suppose we have a class Animal and we want to extend it to produce class Dog. An animal has a name. A Dog has a name and an owner. Write the class declarations, the constructors, and the toString methods for these two classes.\n\nThe class AnimalTester1 tests these classes and their methods.
